text: Gei ang gi digau ala ne dubu i Judah ge gu hagababa bolo ginaadou gaa hula gaa noho i Egypt, Au e hai loo gi modongoohia humalia bolo digaula e hai loo gi daaligi gii mmade. Digaula huogodoo, digau aamua mo digau lligi, gaa mmade i Egypt. Digaula e mmade i tauwa mo di hiigai. Digaula gaa hai di mee e hagamadagudagu dangada. Nia daangada ga gadagada gi digaula, ga hagaingoo digaula bolo gu haga halauwa.
